reviewText: Requires region B player. I've only watched The 400 Blows so far, but picture and sound quality are excellent and the screen test extras are fun. This + the 2nd Curzon box set of Truffaut give you a lot of films for the dollar. The film is great, a worthy member of the group (Vigo's Zero do Conduite; De Sica's Shoeshine, Bunuel's Los Olvidados). Fast Times at Ridgemont High? Maybe not.
